item.title: 中国官员预期经济政策将崎岖不平
item.description: 中国官员周五承认，本周中国共产党重要会议结束时再次强调的一系列经济目标包含 "许多复杂的矛盾"，这表明未来政策实施的道路将崎岖不平。【原文：Chinese officials acknowledged on Friday the sweeping list of economic goals re-emphasised at the end of a key Communist Party meeting this week contained "many complex contradictions," pointing to a bumpy road ahead for policy implementation.】

item.title: 中共官员称中国经济复苏不够强劲
item.description: 中国共产党负责财经事务的高级官员周五表示，中国的经济复苏还不够强劲，政府需要更有效地实施宏观政策。【原文：China's economic recovery is not strong enough and the government needs to implement macro policies more effectively, said the senior Communist Party official for financial and economic affairs on Friday.】

item.title: 日元疲软推动旅游业蓬勃发展，日本 6 月游客人数达到创纪录的 314 万
item.description: 周五的官方数据显示，由于日元疲软推动了旅游业的繁荣，日本 6 月份的月度游客人数创下了新纪录，而旅游业正成为日本经济的主要驱动力。【原文：Japan set a fresh record for monthly visitors in June, official data showed on Friday, as the weak yen fuelled a tourism boom that is becoming a key driver for the economy.】

item.title: 中国开始对美国丙酸产品征收反倾销税
item.description: 中国商务部周五表示，将从 7 月 21 日起对原产于美国的丙酸产品实施为期五年的反倾销税。【原文：China's Ministry of Commerce said on Friday it will implement anti-dumping duties on propionic acid products originating from the United States for five years from July 21.】

item.title: 日本下调经济增长预期，专家小组成员担心日元疲软带来的痛苦
item.description: 日本政府周五下调了今年的经济增长预期，原因是日元疲软导致进口成本上涨，从而打击了消费，凸显了经济复苏的脆弱性。【原文：Japan's government cut this year's growth forecast on Friday as consumption took a hit from rising import costs due to a weak yen, highlighting the fragile nature of the economic recovery.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因科技股下跌蔓延和全球不确定性而下跌
item.description: 由于地缘政治格局和主要经济体的不确定性，即使在全球宽松利率周期开始之际，投资者仍面临更多不利因素，本周亚洲股市将以低迷收尾。【原文：Asian shares are set to end the week on a sour note, as uncertainty across the geopolitical landscape and in major economies added to headwinds for investors even as the global rate easing cycle gets under way.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美国利率和日元走势，美元将勉强实现周涨幅
item.description: 周五，美元持稳，有望结束连续两周的跌势，因为美国的劳动力和制造业数据让交易员们继续思考美联储今年将在何时以及以何种幅度降息。【原文：The dollar was steady and poised to snap a two-week losing run on Friday as U.S. labour and manufacturing data kept traders pondering on when and by how much the Federal Reserve would cut rates this year.】

item.title: 三星电子与罢工工会周五恢复谈判
item.description: 韩国三星电子公司和其最大的工会代表表示，双方同意在周五恢复谈判。【原文：Samsung Electronics and representatives of its biggest workers' union in South Korea that has been on a strike since early last week have agreed to resume negotiations on Friday, the two sides said.】

item.title: 油价因情绪疲软而下跌，将出现单周跌幅
item.description: 由于喜忧参半的经济信号打压了投资者情绪并提振了美元，周五油价下跌，创下第二周跌幅。【原文：Oil prices fell on Friday, setting up for a second weekly decline, as mixed economic signals weighed on investor sentiment and boosted the dollar.】

item.title: 上调 2024 年收入预期后，台积电股价仍下跌近 2
item.description: 在台北上市的台积电股价周五开盘下跌，尽管该公司上调了全年营收预期，并公布了第二季度净利润跑赢大市。【原文：Taipei-listed shares of TSMC fell at the market open on Friday, even after the company raised its full-year revenue forecast and reported a market-beating net profit for the second quarter.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第二季度交付量增长 88%，积压订单创 7 年新高
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周四表示，尽管航空航天业供应链问题持续存在，但该公司在2024年第二季度已交付47架飞机，同比增长88%，并重申了全年业绩展望。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer said on Thursday it had delivered 47 aircraft in the second quarter of 2024, an 88% increase from the prior year, and reaffirmed its full-year outlook despite ongoing aerospace industry supply chain issues.】

item.title: 被解雇的花旗集团银行家称首席运营官有意在银行指标方面欺骗监管机构
item.description: 根据周四晚些时候提交的一份修订诉讼，一名前花旗集团董事总经理称，她被解雇是因为拒绝在银行风险管理方面误导联邦监管机构，她指控花旗集团首席运营官故意欺骗。【原文：A former Citigroup managing director who said she was fired because she refused to mislead a federal regulator about the bank's risk management accused Citigroup's chief operating officer of intentional deception, according to an amended lawsuit filed late on Thursday.】

item.title: 日本 6 月核心通胀率回升，日本央行仍有加息空间
item.description: 周五公布的数据显示，日本6月份核心消费者物价同比上涨2.6%，连续第二个月加速上涨，使市场对日本央行可能很快加息的预期持续升温。【原文：Japan's core consumer prices rose 2.6% in June from a year earlier, data showed on Friday, accelerating for a second straight month and keeping alive market expectations that the central bank could soon raise interest rates.】

item.title: 美国司法部称已在达成波音公司最终认罪协议方面取得实质性进展
item.description: 美国司法部周四表示，政府在与波音公司达成最终认罪协议方面取得了 "实质性进展"，但预计不会在 7 月 24 日之前提交细节。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday the government has made "substantial progress" toward reaching a final plea agreement with Boeing but does not expect to file the details before July 24.】

item.title: 美联储戴利称物价稳定 "尚未实现
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周四表示，在呼吁降息之前，她希望能有更多信心表明通胀率正在回到美联储2%的目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said on Thursday she's looking for more confidence that inflation is moving back to the Fed's 2% target before calling for a rate cut.】

item.title: 外国持有的美国国债增加，日本库存减少
item.description: 美国财政部周四报告称，外国持有的美国国债在 5 月份创下了历史新高，而日本的巨额库存下降与日本似乎开始采取干预措施支持其货币密切相关。【原文：Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasuries hit a record in May, the Treasury Department reported on Thursday, while a decline in Japan's huge stockpile closely coincided with what appeared to be the start of intervention to support its currency.】

item.title: 中国经济增长放缓，顽固的储蓄者无视消费诱惑
item.description: 尽管家庭存款在放缓，银行也在降息，但中国的消费支出却未能对政府的措施做出反应，这表明规避风险的居民更倾向于偿还债务和购买理财产品。【原文：Chinese consumer spending has failed to respond to government measures even though household deposits are slowing and banks have slashed interest rates, a sign risk-averse residents prefer to repay debt and buy wealth management products.】

item.title: 早间竞标：期待科技风暴后的平静，关注日本 CPI
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Glass Lewis 建议 Vista Outdoor 股东投票支持与 CSG 的交易
item.description: 路透社在周四看到的一份报告中称，代理咨询公司 Glass Lewis 建议 Vista Outdoor 股东投票支持该公司弹药部门与捷克斯洛伐克集团（CSG）合并的提议。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Glass Lewis has recommended Vista Outdoor shareholders to vote in favor of the proposed merger of the company's ammunition unit with Czechoslovak Group (CSG), in a report seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 与博通公司就开发新型人工智能芯片举行会谈
item.description: 据《信息报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 正在与包括博通（Broadcom）在内的芯片设计商商讨开发一款新的人工智能芯片。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI is in discussion with chip designers, including Broadcom , about developing a new artificial intelligence chip, the Information reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗银行与蒙特利尔交易所就期权报告问题达成和解
item.description: 花旗集团与蒙特利尔交易所（Bourse de Montreal）达成协议，以解决该交易所周四称花旗集团未报告超过一定限额的期权合约头寸的指控。【原文：Citigroup reached an agreement with the Bourse de Montreal to resolve allegations that it failed to report positions on options contracts exceeding a certain threshold, the exchange said on Thursday.】

item.title: 5 月份外国持有的美国国债创历史新高
item.description: 美国财政部周四公布的数据显示，5月份外国持有的美国国债创下历史新高，超过了3月份创下的纪录。【原文：Foreign holdings of U.S. Treasuries rose to a record high in May, exceeding the previous record in March, data from the Treasury Department showed on Thursday.】

item.title: Netflix 用户数量超预期，但对下一季度持谨慎态度
item.description: Netflix 周四表示，该公司第二季度新增订户超过 800 万，原因是该流媒体服务受益于对密码共享的打击，以及《布里格顿》、《驯鹿宝宝》和《汤姆-布雷迪的咆哮》等影片。【原文：Netflix said on Thursday it added more than 8 million subscribers in its second quarter as the streaming service benefited from a password-sharing crackdown and such titles as "Bridgerton," "Baby Reindeer" and "The Roast of Tom Brady."】

item.title: 房地美称美国关键抵押贷款利率降至 3 月以来最低点
item.description: 本周，美国流行的 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款平均利率降至 3 月中旬以来的最低水平，这对正在努力寻找立足点的房地产市场来说是一个可喜的进展，如果美联储在未来几个月如期降息，这一进展可能会持续下去。【原文：The average interest rate on the popular U.S. 30-year fixed-rate mortgage fell to its lowest level since mid-March this week, a welcome development for a housing market struggling to find its footing and one that may continue if the Federal Reserve cuts rates as expected in the months ahead.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，协作软件制造商 Smartsheet 有收购意向
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，市值 63 亿美元的美国工作场所协作软件制造商 Smartsheet 在吸引了收购公司的收购兴趣后，已经聘请了投资银行家。【原文：Smartsheet , a U.S. maker of workplace collaboration software with a market value of $6.3 billion, has tapped investment bankers after attracting acquisition interest from buyout firms, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴西将 2024 年国内生产总值预测值维持在 +2.5%，上调通胀预期
item.description: 巴西财政部周四将今年的经济增长预期维持在 2.5%，但将通胀预期从 5 月份的 3.7%上调至 3.9%。【原文：Brazil's Finance Ministry maintained its economic growth projection for this year at 2.5% on Thursday but raised the inflation estimate to 3.9% from 3.7% calculated in May.】

item.title: 斯特兰蒂斯因火灾风险召回 2.4 万辆克莱斯勒小型货车，并呼吁在室外停车
item.description: 由于存在起火风险，Stellantis 周四在全球召回了约 24,000 辆克莱斯勒 Pacifica 插电式混合动力小型货车，并敦促车主将车停在室外，远离建筑物。【原文：Stellantis on Thursday recalled about 24,000 Chrysler Pacifica plug-in hybrid minivans worldwide because of fire risks, and urged owners to park outside, away from structures. and not to recharge the vehicles pending a software update.】

item.title: 航空航天工人就强制加班问题向飞机制造商提出挑战
item.description: 北美航空航天工厂的工人们正在寻求减少强制性加班时间，并将每周工作时间锁定为四天，但却遭到了试图提高产量以满足喷气式飞机激增需求的飞机制造商的抵制。【原文：North American aerospace factory workers seeking to reduce mandatory overtime and lock in four-day work weeks are facing some pushback from planemakers trying to increase production to meet soaring demand for jets.】

item.title: Ardent Health 在纽交所首秀不温不火，跌幅达 6
item.description: 医疗保健服务提供商 Ardent Health 周四在纽约证券交易所首次上市，开盘股价比首次公开发行价低 6%，反映出在降息不确定的情况下，投资者对新股上市持谨慎态度。【原文：Healthcare provider Ardent Health's shares opened 6% below their initial public offering price in their NYSE debut on Thursday, reflecting new investor caution with new listings amid rate cut uncertainties.】

item.title: 美联储洛根称赞银行为贴现窗口做准备取得进展
item.description: 达拉斯联储主席洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）周四表示，美国央行在确保银行在必要时能够动用美联储紧急流动性方面正在取得进展。【原文：Dallas Federal Reserve President Lorie Logan said on Thursday the U.S. central bank is making progress in making sure banks can tap Fed emergency liquidity if needed.】
